info.title: Events Manager(Eventeria)
info.description:
# Introduction
API documentation for Events Manager

# Status Codes

201 - A resource is created successfully(e.g. adding a new center)

200 - Get request for resource successful (e.g getting all events)

400 - Incomplete or invalid request for a resource

401 - Invalid, expired token or failed authorisation

403 - Forbidden request for a resource

post.description: authenticates a user in the database

x-unitTests.x-testDescription: authenticates a user in the database

get.description: retrieves all events for a particular user

get.description: Get events slated for a center

parameters.name: centerId
parameters.description: id of the center to be viewed

application/json.message: You do not have permission to access this page

x-unitTests.x-testDescription: Get events slated for a center

rows.name: Sheba Event Center
rows.description: Sheba Event Centre are perfect for events like weddings, birthday ,parties, trainings, conferences, exhibitions, product launches, meetings, and entertainment events.

rows.name: Protea Hotel
rows.description: The polished hotel is 9 km from the city centre, 4 km from Murtala Muhammed International Airport and 6 km from Ikeja City Mall, Featuring plush modern decor, the rooms come with free Wi-Fi, flat-screen TVs and minibars, as well as in-room safes, and tea and coffeemaking facilities, while suites add separate living rooms.Amenities include an outdoor pool, a fitness centre and massage treatments, as well as a sophisticated regional restaurant and a 24-hour cocktail bar.

expectedResponse.body: {"message":"Centers Found!","centers":{"count":2,"rows":[{"id":2,"name":"Sheba Event Center","location":"Ikeja","capacity":5000,"price":10000,"facilities":["Parking Space","Tennis Court"],"type":"Classic","description":"Sheba Event Centre are perfect for events like weddings, birthday ,parties, trainings, conferences, exhibitions, product launches, meetings, and entertainment events.","image":"http://res.cloudinary.com/felglitz/image/upload/v1515539253/userevent_klrvuu.jpg","createdAt":"2018-05-18","updatedAt":"2018-05-18"},{"id":1,"name":"Protea Hotel","location":"Ikeja","capacity":1000,"price":50000,"facilities":["Swimming Pool","Casino"],"type":"Exquisite","description":"The polished hotel is 9 km from the city centre, 4 km from Murtala Muhammed International Airport and 6 km from Ikeja City Mall, Featuring plush modern decor, the rooms come with free Wi-Fi, flat-screen TVs and minibars, as well as in-room safes, and tea and coffeemaking facilities, while suites add separate living rooms.Amenities include an outdoor pool, a fitness centre and massage treatments, as well as a sophisticated regional restaurant and a 24-hour cocktail bar.","image":"http://res.cloudinary.com/felglitz/image/upload/v1515539253/userevent_klrvuu.jpg","createdAt":"2018-05-18","updatedAt":"2018-05-20"}]},"meta":{"pagination":{"currentPageUrl":"http://localhost:1991/api/v1/centers?page=1","currentPage":1,"totalPages":1,"offset":0,"limit":3}}}
